game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to quest giver.
game.description: Rumors say the lost artifact is hidden in a forgotten temple deep in the jungle. Bring it back to claim your reward.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the forgotten temple.
task.description: Explore the jungle and search for any signs of the lost temple.
task.location: Jungle Clearing, southwest of the village

task.objective: Enter the temple and navigate to its heart.
task.description: Beware of traps and puzzles that guard the artifact.
